system.description:
Benefit

Select a skill. If the character does not have the selected skill as a focused skill, they gain it as one, and have a +2 miscellaneous bonus to the chosen skill. If the character already has the selected skill as a focused skill, they gain a +4 miscellaneous bonus to the chosen skill instead.

Special

When selecting Craft skills, Perform skills, or Knowledge skills, a single specific skill is selected. This feat can be taken multiple times. Each time it is taken, it applies to a different skill.
